search.query: | tstats count where `cs_wineventlog_system` by host | eval data="Data Present" | inputlookup all_windows_hosts.csv append=true | stats first(data) as data by host | fillnull value="Data Not Present" data | appendpipe [ where data="Data Not Present" | mvcombine host | eval temp_host=mvjoin(host, "\", \"") | eval host_filter="(NOT host IN (\"".temp_host."\"))" | eval extra_event=1] | sort extra_event | eval host_filter=if(isnull(host_filter),"",host_filter)
search host="$host$" | where isnull(extra_event) | table host data | sort data host

`cs_windows_idx` sourcetype="WMI:InstalledUpdates" host="$host$" | dedup HotFixID, host | join type=left host [ search `cs_windows_idx` sourcetype="WMI:Version" | table host os_name os_release] | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, event_time)` | table event_time host os_name os_release HotFixID InstalledOn InstalledBy | sort -event_time host

`cs_wineventlog_system` host="$host$" $tkn_host_filter$ $tkn_patch_numbers$ EventCode=19 SourceName="Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient" NOT "Microsoft Endpoint Protection" NOT "Microsoft Defender Antivirus" | eval message=replace(Message, "^Installation Successful: Windows successfully installed the following update: ", "") | append [| inputlookup all_windows_hosts.csv | search host="$host$" $tkn_host_filter$ | eval no_event="No Update Event Found"] | stats latest(_time) as _time, latest(message) as message, first(no_event) as no_event by host | eval message = if(isnull(message), no_event, message) | table _time host message | rename message as latest_update | sort -_time host
